sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import {useParams, useNavigate} from "react-router-dom" import styles from "./Characters.module.css" export default function CharacterDetails(){ let [character, setCharacter] = useState({}) let {id} = useParams() let home = useNavigate() useEffect(()=>{ fetch(`https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character/${id}`) .then(response=>response.json()) .then(data=>setCharacter({...data})) }, []) const handleBackToHome = ()=>home("/characters") return(

{character?.name}

{/* pasar a una table */}
STATUS {character?.status}
SPECIE {character?.gender}
ORIGIN {character.origin?.name}
LOCATION {character.location}
{/*

STATUS: {character?.status}

SPECIE: {character?.species}

GENDER: {character?.gender}

ORIGIN: {character.origin?.name}

LOCATION: {character.location?.name}

*/}
) }
